From: g-liberatedlearning

http://games.groups.yahoo.com/group/unschooling_gamers/
and he has tons of experience with Nintendo games!!

Chris

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Game forums?
messages.msgSnippet: ... There is a wonderful, very supportive, sweet group called Unschooling Gamers.  It s very active and there are lots of kids and parents participating, and
messages.messageBody:
At 10:19 2/11/2008, you wrote:
>Hello,
>
>My son is looking to talk to other kids about Nintendo games (he's
>8). I'm not familiar with game forums. Can any Moms or kids
>recommend a good forum?
>
>Thank you,
>Holly

There is a wonderful, very supportive, sweet group called Unschooling
Gamers. It's very active and there are lots of kids and parents
participating, and people are kind. Here's a link:

http://games.groups.yahoo.com/group/unschooling_gamers

I hope that helps!

~Marji



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Game forums?
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, My son is looking to talk to other kids about Nintendo games (he s 8). I m not familiar with game forums. Can any Moms or kids recommend a good forum?
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

My son is looking to talk to other kids about Nintendo games (he's 8). I'm not familiar with game forums. Can any Moms or kids recommend a good forum?

Thank you,
Holly
